short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will try to alter the looks of VBForums.com. Coded by - Akhilesh.B.Chandran. My website: www.akhileshbc.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will slightly alters the looks of the famous developer forum named VBForums.com
Apart from the alteration of looks, it has many other features that includes:

- Highlighting of RESOLVED posts
- Friends birthday notifier 
- Profile badge generation
- etc..

For any discussions/screenshots/news about updates, visit: 
==========================================================
